CustomField.description: Enter the API name of the Base object (where the button or link will be used). Example: A document containing Opportunity fields, or a table of Opportunity Products associated with an Opportunity, would use the "Opportunity" as its base object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of the Base object (where the button or link will be used). Example: A document containing Opportunity fields, or a table of Opportunity Products associated with an Opportunity, would use the "Opportunity" as its base object.
CustomField.label: Base object API
